data.name: ErrorCmsOptionsOnMapGuideMap
data.value: Commerical layer options are only available for non-MapGuide maps

data.name: ErrorInvalidResourceIdentifierType
data.value: Invalid resource identifier type. Must be Library or Session

data.name: ErrorOverlayOptionsOnNonMapGuideMap
data.value: Overlay options are only applicable to MapGuide maps

data.name: ErrorResourceIdCannotChangeExtensionForFolder
data.value: Cannot change extension for a folder

data.name: ErrorResourceIdentifierInvalidChars
data.value: The resource name must not contain ':', \"//\" or '.'

data.name: ErrorResourceIdentifierNameInvalidChars
data.value: The new name must not contain the \"/\" character

data.name: ErrorUnknownResourceType
data.value: The given type is not a known resource type

data.name: ERR_FS_NO_ALIAS
data.value: This feature source does not connect an externally aliased file

data.name: ERR_FS_NO_EMBEDDED_DATA
data.value: This feature source does not connect to an embedded data file

data.name: ERR_NOT_RESOURCE_CONTENT_XML
data.value: XML content does not match any known resource

data.name: ERR_NO_SERIALIZER
data.value: Could not find matching serializer for this resource:

data.name: ERR_SERIALIZER_ALREADY_REGISTERED
data.value: A resource serializer has already been registered for {0} v{1}

data.name: WL_Desc_Buffer
data.value: Create buffers around the selected features

data.name: WL_Desc_Copy
data.value: Copy current view of map to clipboard

data.name: WL_Desc_InitialCenterScale
data.value: Zoom to initial map center and scale

data.name: WL_Desc_InitialMapView
data.value: Fit the extents of the map to the window

data.name: WL_Desc_MapTip
data.value: Click to enable/disable display of map tooltips

data.name: WL_Desc_Pan
data.value: Drag the map to view areas out of range

data.name: WL_Desc_PanDown
data.value: Pan down by a preset increment

data.name: WL_Desc_PanLeft
data.value: Pan left by a preset increment

data.name: WL_Desc_PanRight
data.value: Pan right by a preset increment

data.name: WL_Desc_PanUp
data.value: Pan up by a preset increment

data.name: WL_Desc_RefreshMap
data.value: Refresh map to reload all layers keeping current center and scale

data.name: WL_Desc_Select
data.value: Select features by clicking and dragging

data.name: WL_Desc_SelectPolygon
data.value: Click and drag to select all features that fall within

data.name: WL_Desc_SelectRadius
data.value: Click and drag to select all features inside the circle

data.name: WL_Desc_SelectWithin
data.value: Select features that fall within currently selected areas

data.name: WL_Desc_TaskList
data.value: View a list of available tasks

data.name: WL_Desc_ZoomDynamic
data.value: Zoom dynamically by clicking and dragging

data.name: WL_Desc_ZoomIn
data.value: Zoom in by a preset increment

data.name: WL_Desc_ZoomOut
data.value: Zoom out by a preset increment

data.name: WL_Desc_ZoomSelection
data.value: Zoom to the extents of selected features

data.value: Factory method already registered for version:

data.name: LoadProcFactoryMethodAlreadyRegistered
data.value: Factory method already registered for load procedure type:

data.value: Could not create load procedure of type:

data.value: Measure distances and areas on the map

data.name: ADF_Widget_ZoomOut_Desc
data.value: Zoom out by a preset increment
